definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: Together, it is the most award-winning combined antivirus and antispyware on the market today.
sentences.chinese: 一起，这是最屡获殊荣的市场整合防毒和反间谍今天。

sentences.english: I was a member of the 15th Marine Counterintelligence Team, operating just below the Demilitarized Zone.
sentences.chinese: 我是反间谍第15组的成员，就在非武装区之外活动。

sentences.english: Your computer should have anti-virus and anti-spyware software.
sentences.chinese: 你的电脑应该有防病毒和反间谍软件。

sentences.english: A very good free anti-spyware program is AdAware.
sentences.chinese: AdAware是一个很好的免费反间谍软件程序。

sentences.english: Alternatively, there are other free anti-spyware software programs available.
sentences.chinese: 另外，还有一些其他的免费的反间谍软件程序可用。

sentences.english: Run antispyware programs on a regular basis.
sentences.chinese: 定期运行反间谍软件程序。

sentences.english: The center will focus on the related disciplines of CI and HUMINT.
sentences.chinese: 该中心将关注反间谍与人工情报的相关条例。

sentences.english: Run one or two anti-spyware applications.
sentences.chinese: 运行一两款反间谍软件。

sentences.english: Both companies offer the anti-spyware software suite at no charge.
sentences.chinese: 这两个公司都向自己的用户免费提供反间谍服务。

sentences.english: Added ability to remove Counter Spy-Plane effects with the Jammer.
sentences.chinese: 新增功能以消除干扰机与反间谍飞机的影响。

definition: US Central Intelligence Agency, CIA/abbr. for 中央情報局|中央情报局[Zhong1 yang1 Qing2 bao4 ju2]
secret service/special service/secret service agent/special agent
KGB (Soviet secret police)/member of the KGB
